==IVEF 0.1.1 Released==
20 May 2009 - IVEF 0.1.1 is now available to the open source community. IVEF is a cross-platform message exchange framework for VTS data exchange. IVEF is available for customer use, evaluation and open source download.

IVEF includes full interface capabilities in C++, JAVA and OBJECTIVE-C and has thoroughly  been tested on Linux (OpenSuSE 10.3 both 32 and 64 bit), Apple Mac OS X 10.5 and MS Windows XP SP2 

For detailed information on fixes and optimizations included in this releases, please consult the [http://code.google.com/p/ivef-sdk/source/list change] log, or browse the source code contained in the [http://code.google.com/p/ivef-sdk/source/browse/tags/IVEF_0_1_1/?r=284 SVN] repository

===Open Source Downloads===
Open Source Edition of IVEF 0.1.1 is available.  The Open Source Editions are released under the GPL for open source development. 

===Fixes===
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ivef-sdk/issues/detail?id=18 Issue-18] DateTime values are not parsed correctly when not specified with miliseconds
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ivef-sdk/issues/detail?id=19 Issue-19] It is possible to generate illegal XML
